name: phonebook_backend
description: the backend for the phonebook react application

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../Part_2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../../Part_3/phonebook
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m updatedbuild && git push heroku main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy

author: Archie Beales
